title: Chicago Bears sleeper talk with Big Cat (Football 05/11)
description:
Dan Katz of Barstool Sports joins Will Brinson to break down the Bears offseason, debate whether Dan is in or out on Mitchell Trubisky, to pick one thing he would change about the Bears if he was in charge, discuss whether Pete Prisco or Nick Kostos is wrong in how they rank the Bears heading into 2018, if the Bears can be the 2017 Rams, what his favorite Week 1 bet is right now, who would be favored between Chris and Kyle Long in a UFC fight, whether Russell Wilson is an NC State or Wisconsin guy and if he would trade Anthony Rizzo to the Cardinals for a Bears Super Bowl win.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
